cause.description:
I was accepted to Interlochen Arts Academy, but even with the generous amout of money the financial aid committee granted me with, I still cannot afford to attend. I'm hoping to raise enough to attend this fall.
PLEASE DO NOT DONATE VIA FACEBOOK DIRECTLY TO THIS CAUSE! I won't recieve your donation, it will go to Interlochen, but it will not benefit me personally. If you choose to donate, please make checks payable to: INTERLOCHEN CENTER FOR THE ARTS. Be sure to include my name on the check to ensure proper credit to my tuition account.
Interlochen Center for the Arts Office of Admission and Financial Aid c/o Karolyn Byers P.O. Box 199 Interlochen, MI 49643-0199
Thank you! =]
1. Karolyn wants to major in music performance and Interlochen's prestigous school will more than prepare her for such future plans.
cause.mission: Raise enough money to send Karolyn to Interlochen.
cause.name: Send Karolyn to Interlochen!
